name: Princess and Frog
description: This take on Frogger features music and speech. In this variation, you are a frog trying to get to the princess's castle. You must first cross a road filled with jousting knights on horseback. You must then cross the moat, filled with snakes and alligators. The alligators will submerge, drowning your frog if he's riding on that alligator's back. If you make it safely, you become a handsome prince.

shot.caption: Title screen and attract mode. Princess and Frog is a Frogger clone with medieval imagery.
Starting a new game. You must first cross a street filled with jousting knights on horseback.
Picked up the lady frog while crossing the castle moat.
Only one more castle gate to reach..
When all the castle gates have been reached, the level is over and you move on to the next.
